long.am,bg,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,:
Ultra extension enables it's users to download any Instagram Stories, Photos, Videos or Reels from instagram.com.

It supports 2 methods:
âœ… En-masse: Downloads many files at once.
This feature is absolutely must-have for those who want to download and save multiple video or photo files.

âœ… One at a time: Downloads single photo or video from Instagram Stories, Posts or Reels.
Perfect solution when you need to bulk save any specific content from Instagram.

Ultra | Ultimate Downloader for Instagram provides several downloading options  so you could Ñhose the one you need right now.

ğŸ”µ Bulk (mass) download of Photo, Video, and Reels. If you would like to download many posts from Instagram at once, just click Ultra button in navigation menu of Instagram and select the option you need.

ğŸ”µ Download of any single available Post from any page of Instagram. To start downloading click Ultra icon you will see on Instagram post you'd like to save.

ğŸ”µ "Download" and "Download all" options of any Story or Highlight available*. You can save any story to your hard drive, whether there is one Story you are interested in or many of them.
    ğŸ”¹ Click "Download" to save the active Story.
    ğŸ”¹ Click "Download all" to download multiple Stories at once. Ultra will pack them into a zip file automatically.

*To download Stories click Ultra icon located in the upper part of the Story or Highlight you are viewing.


ğŸŒ— Customise Insta look and take care of your eyes. Ultra Downloader automatically adopts Instagram native theme (dark or light) thus saving your vision and giving you better user experience.


ğŸ‰ Install Ultra | Ultimate Downloader for Instagram and level up your Instagram user experience.


â—ï¸â—ï¸â—ï¸NOTE â—ï¸â—ï¸â—ï¸

âœ¨This browser extension is an independent project and is not related to official Instagram website or application. This is solely my development intended to provide some functionality not provided by official Instagram. I am making user experience better.
âœ¨ Mass download is available only on pages supported by Instagram.

Ekstensi ultra memungkinkan penggunanya mengunduh Cerita, Foto, Video, atau Reel Instagram apa pun dari instagram.com.

Ini mendukung 2 metode:
âœ… Secara massal: Mengunduh banyak file sekaligus.
Fitur ini wajib dimiliki oleh Anda yang ingin mendownload dan menyimpan banyak file video atau foto.

âœ… Satu per satu: Mengunduh satu foto atau video dari Instagram Stories, Postingan, atau Reel.
Solusi sempurna ketika Anda perlu menyimpan konten tertentu secara massal dari Instagram.

Sangat | Ultimate Downloader untuk Instagram menyediakan beberapa opsi pengunduhan sehingga Anda dapat memilih salah satu yang Anda perlukan saat ini.

ğŸ”µ Pengunduhan Foto, Video, dan Gulungan secara massal (massal). Jika Anda ingin mendownload banyak postingan dari Instagram sekaligus, cukup klik tombol Ultra di menu navigasi Instagram dan pilih opsi yang Anda perlukan.

ğŸ”µ Unduh setiap Postingan yang tersedia dari halaman mana pun di Instagram. Untuk mulai mengunduh, klik ikon Ultra yang akan Anda lihat di postingan Instagram yang ingin Anda simpan.

ğŸ”µ Opsi "Unduh" dan "Unduh semua" dari Cerita atau Sorotan apa pun yang tersedia*. Anda dapat menyimpan cerita apa pun ke hard drive Anda, apakah ada satu Cerita yang Anda minati atau banyak di antaranya.
    ğŸ”¹ Klik "Unduh" untuk menyimpan Story yang aktif.
    ğŸ”¹ Klik "Unduh semua" untuk mengunduh beberapa Stories sekaligus. Ultra akan mengemasnya ke dalam file zip secara otomatis.

*Untuk mengunduh Cerita, klik ikon Ultra yang terletak di bagian atas Cerita atau Sorotan yang Anda lihat.


ğŸŒ— Sesuaikan tampilan Insta dan rawat mata Anda. Ultra Downloader secara otomatis mengadopsi tema asli Instagram (gelap atau terang) sehingga menghemat penglihatan Anda dan memberi Anda pengalaman pengguna yang lebih baik.

Supporta 2 metodi:
En-masse: Scarica molti file contemporaneamente.
Questa funzione Ã¨ assolutamente indispensabile per chi vuole scaricare e salvare piÃ¹ file video o foto.

Uno alla volta: Scarica una singola foto o un singolo video da Instagram Stories, Post o Reels.
La soluzione perfetta per salvare in blocco qualsiasi contenuto specifico da Instagram.

Ultra | Ultimate Downloader for Instagram offre diverse opzioni di download, in modo che possiate scegliere quella di cui avete bisogno in questo momento.
